name: OrbusVR: Reborn
summary: EDIT: Starting on February 10th 2025, OrbusVR: Reborn will no longer be available for purchase, including all in-game purchases. We will continue to maintain servers until they sunset on April 6th 2025. We greatly appreciate the community support we have been blessed enough to receive over the years and continue to receive.  For more information on planned farewell celebrations please visit our community forums page.
